He's the one they call Dr. Feelgood

Involved in nuclear waste accident but comes out of it okay and now has superpowers. Spends his spare time fighting crime and getting all the chicks. Starts a Nuclear awareness program and a school for underprivelaged pets. Wins the lottery and uses the money to buy out 10 pet rescue shelters, then gives the pets to families across america. Cures the world of bird flu and beats up Garry. Game over.
